title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1003.2 - Schedules of fares and service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1003.2 - Schedules of fares and service

State Regulations
(a) For travel via the facilities of the New

York City Transit Authority, the Manhattan and Bronx Surface Transit Operating

Authority and the Staten Island Rapid Transit Operating Authority: (1)
the schedule of fares is available at
customer service booths; and
(2)
the schedule of service is available by writing to the NYCTA Information

Center, 370 Jay Street, Brooklyn, NY 11201. (b) For travel via the facilities operated by
or for the Metro-North Commuter Railroad Company, the schedules of fares and
service are available at ticket offices or by writing to the Corporate

Communications Department, Metro-North Commuter Railroad Company, 347 Madison

Avenue, New York, NY 10017. (c) For
travel via the facilities of the Long Island Rail Road Company, the schedules
of fares and service are available at ticket offices or by writing to the Long

Island Rail Road Company, Jamaica Station, Jamaica, NY 11355. (d) For travel via the facilities of the

Metropolitan Suburban Bus Authority, the schedules of fares and service are
available at the Hempstead Transit Center or by writing to the Metropolitan

Suburban Bus Authority, 700 Commercial Avenue, Garden City, NY
11530. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1003.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
